structure.unit: ARTICLE D. - STABLES AND HOLDING FACILITIES

text.section: The annual fee for a cattery license shall be imposed pursuant to the provisions of Part 2, Chapter 2, Article B of this Code.

The fee requirements of this section shall be waived if the applicant has been granted a valid kennel license where the kennel is authorized to house the same number or less dogs as cats applied for by the applicant. If the application is for authorization to house more cats than the applicant is authorized to house dogs under a valid kennel license, the difference in license fee shall be the amount of the annual fee. (Code 1959 , ยง4-34)
